column1: The Purple Pig////I was so excited that this place was a short walk from my hotel. I had to wait for a seat at the bar--for a Sunday night the place was packed! But once I looked at the menu I could tell why. There were so many items I wanted to try
column2: but as I was there on my own
column3: I went for the pork belly. The sauce was a tad sweet
column4: but the hint of espresso cut it
column5: as well as the radish garnish.
